narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This facility meets the requirements for obtaining a Class "A" breeders license.
 
Exit interview conducted with facility representative.
The license fee should be sent to the following address:
                                                                                                  USDA, APHIS, Animal Care
                                                                                                  920 Main Campus Dr., Suite 200
                                                                                                  Raleigh, NC 27606
The pre-licensing process must be completed within 90 days of this inspection or the application will be cancelled
and you will be required to wait 6 mths to re-apply.
